doUserTask
{
float one = 0.0;
float two = 0.0;
float half = 0.0;
float one_half = 0.0;
float three = 0.0;
float four = 0.0;
float number6 = 0.0;
float number7 = 0.0;
float number8 = 0.0;
float number9 = 0.0;
float number10 = 0.0;
float number11 = 0.0;
float number12 = 0.0;
float number13 = 0.0;
float number14 = 0.0;

while(true)
{
	one = 400;
	half = one/2;
	two = one*2;
	three = one*3;
	four = one*4;
	number7 = one/3;
	number6 = one/4;
	number10 = one/6;
	number14 = one/8;
	number8 = half/2;
	number9 = half+number8;
	one_half = half*3;
	number12 = half/3;
	number13 = number12+number12;
	number11 = two+half;
	speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_5, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(half);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number6);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one_half);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(half);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_5, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(half);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SI_5, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number6);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one_half);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(half);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_5, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number9);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_PA_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number6);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_PA_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number9);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number6);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, __melodyVolume*0.5);
	sleep(number14);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume*0.7);
	sleep(number14);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SI_5, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(half);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number6);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one_half);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(half);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_5, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number9);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number6);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one_half);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(half);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_5, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number9);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SI_5, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number6);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one_half);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(half);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_5, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number9);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number6);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SOL_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number9);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number6);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_5, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number9);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number6);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(two);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_PA_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(half);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number13);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_5, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_5, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SI_5, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number9);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number6);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(two);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_PA_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_MI_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(half);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RE_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number13);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_5, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_5, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_5, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(one);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_SI_5, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number9);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(number14);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(number10);
	speaker0.setTune(F_DO_6, __melodyVolume);
	sleep(two);
	speaker0.setTune(F_RA_6, 0);
	sleep(500);

	sleep(1);
}
}
